ABYSS_PILLAR_MORTAR: Generic monster mortar skill with an impact effect that spawns more monsters
AERIAL: Lifts to the air while being untargettable
ALCHEMY_ORB: Encounter throws Alchemy Orb at player's position.
ARAKAALI_LASER_SINGLE: Creates 2 perpendicular beams that cross each other at player location
ARAKAALI_LASER_MULTI: Creates 12 perpendicular beams that cross each other at player location
ARCTIC_ARMOUR: Conjures an icy barrier that chills enemies when encounter is hit. Encounter drop chilled ground while moving, and take less Fire and Physical damage while stationary
BALL_LIGHTNING: Fires a slow-moving projectile that periodically damages enemies in an area around it with bolts of lightning
BEAR_TRAP: Throws a trap that damages and immobilises a single enemy for a duration based on how much damage was dealt
BLADE_BLOSSOM: Creates knives on the ground which fly upwards after a short delay
BLADEFALL: Ethereal weapons rain from the sky, dealing damage to enemies in a sequence of volleys
BLADE_FLURRY: Repeatedly hit enemies in a circle in front of encounter while channelling, dealing damage to and around the enemy. The damage is continually boosted while channelling. Encounter unleashes an additional hit for each stage reached once the channelling ends
BLAST_RAIN: Fires arrows up in the air, to rain down in an area. Each arrow deals area damage around where it lands, and they will all overlap on the targeted location
BLINK_ARROW: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, encounter is teleported to it and a clone is summoned at their old location
BLIZZARD: The snowstorm protects encounter, giving a chance to avoid damage while encounter stands in it
BONE_NOVA: Creates a barrage of projectiles in a circle
BREACH_ICE_SPEAR: Spawns 3 totems in a triangular shape that cast Ice Spears between them
BREACH_PILLAR: Spawns a breach pillar that once passed through spawns monsters
BURNING_GROUND_EFFECT: Encounter leaves burning ground behind them
BURROW: Becomes untargettable by burrowing into the ground and charging to targeted location
CHANNELED_WARP: At the end of channeled warp, player gets teleported to equivalent warp in targeted location
CHARGE: Charges at player's location. This knocks the encounter back and stuns it. Enemies in the way are pushed to the side. Damage and stun are proportional to distance travelled
CHARGED_GROUND_SLAM: Slams the ground, creating empowered wave that travel forwards and damage enemies
CHARGED_HOOK: Throws out an empowered chain, pulling encounter to the terrain hit dealing damage in an area on it's path
CHARGED_SLAM: Strikes enemy foes down with an empowered powerful blow
CHARGED_QUAKE_SLAM: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration
CAUSTIC_ARROW: Fires an arrow which deals chaos damage in an area on impact, and spreads caustic ground. Enemies standing on the caustic ground take chaos damage over time
CHILLED_GROUND: Slows player's cast speed, attack speed and movement speed
CLEAVE: Swings weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging enemies in an area in front of them
CREEPING_FROST: Fires an icy projectile that bursts on impact or when reaching the targeted area, dealing area damage and creating a chilling area that deals cold damage over time
COLD_SNAP: Creates a sudden burst of cold in a targeted area, damaging enemies. Also creates an expanding area which is filled with chilled ground, and deals cold damage over time to enemies
CONDUCTIVITY: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to lightning damage and gives damage hit more chance to shock
COVER_IN_SPIDERS: Encounter covers player in spiders giving them velocity when inside spider web - self ignite or move to bonfire to clear the debuff
CYCLONE: Damages enemies around encounter, then performs a spinning series of attacks as it travels to a target location
DASH: Performs a quick teleport towards a targeted location
DASH_OF_DESTRUCTION: Charges briefly following up with dash
DELAYED_BOMBS: Spawns multiple Bombs around the arena that explode after a delay
DESECRATE: Desecrates the ground with corpses and dealing chaos damage to all enemies in the area
DETONATE_DEAD: Explosion deals base Fire Damage equal to 1% of the corpse's Maximum Life
DISCHARGE: Discharges all the encounter's charges to deal lightning damage to all nearby enemies
DUAL_STRIKE: Attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one strike
ENDURING_CRY: Performs a warcry, taunting all nearby enemies to attack the encounter and granting endurance charges. Gives a brief burst of life regeneration, as well as a buff which grants resistances and physical damage reduction
ETHEREAL_KNIVES: Fires an arc of knives in front of the encounter which deals physical damage
EXPLODING_POD: Spawns multiple pods. When ran through, pods explode after a short delay
EARTHQUAKE: Smashes the ground, dealing damage in an area and cracking the earth. The crack will erupt in a powerful aftershock after a duration.
EARTHQUAKE_CASCADE: Smashes the ground creating fissures in line
ENRAGE: Increases movement speed, damage, attack and cast speed
FALLING_MINIONS: The minion attacks by falling to the ground, causing an impact that deals damage in an area and kills the minion
FIREBALL: Unleashes a ball of fire towards a target which explodes, damaging nearby foes
FIREBALL_STRIKE: Infuses your melee weapon with flame energies as you swing. The stored energy is released from the weapon as projectiles as encounter strikes, flying out to hit farther-away enemies
FIRE_BOMBS: Spawns multiple Fire Bombs around the arena that explode after a delay
FIRE_TRAP: Throws a trap that explodes when triggered, dealing fire damage to surrounding enemies
FIRESTORM: Rains numerous fiery bolts in an area
FISSURE: Spawns a fissure after a delay
FLAMMABILITY: Curses all targets in an area, making them less resistant to fire damage and gives damage hit more chance to ignite
FLAMEBLAST: Channels to build up a large explosion
FLAME_SURGE: Strikes enemies in front of encounter with a surge of flame. Deals more damage to Burning enemies
FLAME_VORTEX: Encounter surrounds themselves in flames causing fire damage to nearby enemies
FLICKER_STRIKE: Teleports the character to a nearby monster and attacks with a melee weapon
FROSTBALL: Fires a slow-moving projectile that pierces through enemies, dealing cold damage
FROST_BLADES: Attacks enemies with increased range, releasing icy blades from the first enemy hit which fly at other enemies
GLACIAL_CASCADE: Icicles emerge from the ground in a series of small bursts, each damaging enemies
GROUND_5_SLAM: Slams the ground, creating 5 waves that travel forwards and damage enemies
GROUND_SLAM: Slams the ground, creating wave that travel forwards and damage enemies
GUIDED_ORBS: Spawns damaging orbs that move towards player until they reach the target or expire
HEAVY_STRIKE: Attacks enemies with a forceful blow
HOOK: Throws out a chain, pulling encounter to the terrain hit dealing damage in an area on it's path
HORIZONTAL_BEAM: Beam that damages enemies it touches
ICE_CRASH: Slams the ground, damaging enemies in an area around the impact in three stages of increasing size
ICE_NOVA: A chilling circle of ice expands from the caster. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will expand from a number of those projectiles instead
ICE_SPEAR: Launches shards of ice in rapid succession. After travelling a short distance they change to a second form, which moves much faster and pierces through enemies
IMMORTAL_CALL: Encounter takes less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time
INVULNERABILITY_AT_30: Becomes invulnerable when encounter reaches 30% hp
INVULNERABILITY_END_ALL_BOSS_PRESENT: Becomes vulnerable once all 3 bosses are present
ION_CANNON: Vertical beam that damages enemies it touches
LACERATE: Slashes twice, releasing waves of force that damage enemies they hit. Enemies in the middle of the slashes can be hit by both slashes
LACERATE_SAND: The yellow slashes have wider angle
LACERATE_BLOOD: The red slashes will have a chance to inflict bleeding
LEAP_SLAM: Jumps into the air, damaging and knocking back enemies with their weapon where they land. Enemies they would land on are pushed out of the way
LIGHTNING_BOLT: Fires few Lightning Bolts at you
LIGHTNING_PILLAR: Creates a lightning wall between activated pillars that deal lightning damage over time, slow enemies and apply shock
LIGHTNING_ORB_PERSIST_TILL_PULLBACK: Creates a lightning orb that moves to a player location and lasts until being pull backed
LIGHTNING_TRAP: Throws a trap that launches a ring of projectiles through the enemy that set it off, dealing lightning damage to them and subsequent targets.
LIGHTNING_TENDRILS: While encounter channels this skill, it releases pulses of electrical energy, dealing lightning damage in a semicircular area in front of encounter
LIGHTNING_WHIP: Strikes enemies in front of encounter with a surge of lightning
LIGHTNING_WARP: Waits for a duration before teleporting to a targeted destination, with the duration based on the distance and encounter's movement speed. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the encounter was and where they teleported to
LIVING_BOMB: Charges up and detonates after short delay
LOCKED_BEAM: Creates a laser beam on a player until player goes out of sight or out of range
MELEE: Strikes enemy foes down with a powerful blow
MOLTEN_SHELL: Applies a buff that adds to encounter's armour, and can take some of the damage from hits for you before being depleted. When the buff expires or is depleted, the skill deals reflected damage to enemies around encounter based on the total damage that was taken from the buff.
MOLTEN_STRIKE: Attack causes balls of molten magma to launch forth from the enemies encounter hits
MORTAR: Fires projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes
OFFERING_OF_JUDGEMENT: Creates an untargettable totem that leaves a damaging pool nearby it's spawn
ORBS: Spawns orbs around the area that move in a stright line in random direction
ORBS_PULLBACK: Pulls existing orbs back to the encounter
POISONOUS_GROUND_EFFECT: Encounter leaves poisonous ground behind them
PROXIMITY_SHIELD: Causes shielded entities to take no direct damage from enemies outside the shield
PULLBACK: Pulls existing or newly created orbs back to the encounter damaging anything in it's path
REAVE: Attacks an area in front of encounter in sequence
REFLECTIVE_MORTAR: Player is affected with a debuff that whenever encounter fires a mortar projectile, a new (unfriendly) projectile also fires mortar projectile that does damage on impact and when the projectile explodes
REFLECTED_WALL_BEAM: Shoots a burning beam that reflects when it's connected with a wall
RIGHTEOUS_FIRE: Engulfs encounter in magical fire that rapidly burns nearby enemies
SCREECHING_BEAM: Creates a channeling beam that does constant damage at player location
SHIELD_CHARGE: Charges at a targeted location based on player location, pushing away enemies in encounter's path and repeatedly dealing damage in a small area in front of encounter. The further encounter travels, the more damage encounter deals.
SHOCK_NOVA: Deals lightning damage in an area around the encounter, conjuring an initial ring followed by a larger circular area.
SLAM: Strikes enemy foes down with a powerful blow
SMOKE_BOMB: Throws a trap that creates cloud of smoke that blinds everyone standing in it
SNIPE: Channels to charge up encounter's bow, gaining stages. Releases to trigger projectile for each stage gained
SNIPERS_MARK: Curses player, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them
SOUL_EATER: For each new spawn death near encounter, encounter gains more damage, cast speed and attack speed
SPARK: Launches unpredictable sparks that move randomly until they hit an enemy or expire.
SPECTRAL_THROW: Throws a spectral copy of encounter's melee weapon. It flies out and then returns to the encounter, in a spinning attack that damages enemies in its path
SPELL_WAVE: Creates a wave with unlimited range that moves towards player location
SPLIT_ARROW: Fires multiple arrows at different targets
GROWING_STORM: Creates a storm that grows over time and deals damage to enemies that stay inside it
STORM_BURST: Unleashes a stream of projectiles while encounter channels this spell, which pierce through enemies, dealing lightning damage. When encounter stops channelling, the projectiles explode, dealing significant damage in an area around them. Additional projectiles are added in sequence
STORM_CALL: Sets a marker at a location. After a short duration, lightning strikes the marker, dealing damage around it. When this happens, it will also set off the lightning at any other markers encounter has cast
SUMMON_CLONES: Encounter creates a circle of untargetable clones everywhere besides his location, that after a short time dash forward in opposite direction
SUMMON_MONSTERS: Encounter creates new monsters to aid said encounter
SUMMON_VORTEXES: Encounter creates multiple vortexes that run in random linear path
SUMMON_STATIONARY_VORTEXES: Encounter creates multiple vortexes that stay still
SUNDER: Slams the ground, creating a wave of broken ground that damages enemies in an area in front of player
SWEEP: Swings a melee weapon in a circle
TAKEOFF: Encounter goes airborne. After short period of time encounter slams to the ground
THROWN_SHIELD: Throws a spectral copy of encounters shield as a projectile which cannot pierce, and deals off-hand damage augmented by the defences of the shield. When it collides with something it will shatter, launching a number of smaller shards as projectiles in all directions
TELEPORT: Teleports encounter to random location in an area
TORNADO_SHOT: Fires a piercing shot that travels until it reaches the targeted location
TRIBOMB: Creates an orb that explodes into 3 smaller projectiles flying in linear random direction
UPHEAVAL: Slams the ground creating Flame Pillars in a forking fashion
WARLORDS_MARK: Curses player. Attacking the cursed player will leech life and mana
WEB_MORTAR: Mortar projectile that leaves ground effect
WEB_MORTAR_GROUND_EFFECT: While standing in web your speed is reduced
VAAL_BURNING_ARROW: Fires an arrow that explodes, dealing fire damage to its target and other nearby enemies, with an increased chance of igniting them
VAAL_GLACIAL_HAMMER: Hits enemies, converting some of encounter's physical damage to cold damage. It traps enemies with encounter in a circle of ice so that they can't escape
VAAL_COLD_SNAP: Creates a sudden burst of cold around encounter, damaging enemies. This also creates a chilling area around encounter which expands and deals cold damage over time to surrounding enemies in addition to chilling them
VAAL_RAIN_OF_ARROWS: Fires a large number of arrows into the air, to land at the target after a short delay. Enemies hit by the arrows are pinned in place, unable to move for a time
VAAL_SUMMON_SKELETONS: Summons an army of skeletal warriors, archers and mages, led by a powerful general
VAAL_SPECTRAL_THROW: Throws a spectral copy of encounter melee weapon. It spirals out in a spinning attack that strikes enemies in its path.
VIPER_STRIKE: Hits enemies, converting some of encounter's physical damage to chaos damage and inflicting poison
